mapper.insert: INSERT INTO USERS (USER_NO, PASSWORD, EMAIL, PHONE, ROLE, BIRTHDAY, U_CREATED_AT, U_UPDATED_AT, USER_FIRSTNAME, USER_LASTNAME) VALUES (USERS_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{password}, #{email}, #{phone}, 'TOURIST', #{birthday, jdbcType=DATE}, SYSDATE, SYSDATE, #{firstName}, #{lastName})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT USER_NO AS userNo, EMAIL AS email, USER_FIRSTNAME AS userFirstName, USER_LASTNAME AS userLastName FROM USERS WHERE EMAIL = #{email, jdbcType=VARCHAR} ) WHERE ROWNUM = 1
